title: New Zealand falls into recession with abrupt economic slowdown
description: New Zealand tipped into recession in the third quarter, official data showed Thursday, with the economy suffering an unexpectedly sharp slump that sent the country's currency tumbling and sparked political finger-pointing. The New Zealand dollar was trading in the late afternoon at US$0.5626 -- down...

title: New Zealand sinks into recession as Q3 GDP dives 1.0%
description:
New Zealand's economy sank into recession in the third quarter as activity dived far more sharply than expected, while the prior quarter was also revised sharply downward, a dire result that cements the case for more aggressive rate cuts.

The local dollar extended an overnight rout to hit a fresh t...
